description:
This rechargeable battery quickly pays for itself. It costs about the same price as 6 sets of alkaline batteries, but provides the equivalent lifespan of more than 900 batteries. Lithium ion batteries perform well at low temperatures and are lighter than alkaline.

  • Rechargeable up to 300 times (beyond that, capacity is approximately 30% reduced)
  • Indicator lights for both remaining power and charge status
  • Easily charges via the included micro USB cable
  • Economical solution to replaceable batteries
  • Compatible with: all Tikkina, Tikka, Zipka, Actik, Actik Core, Tactikka, Tactikka + and Tactikka +RGB headlamps
name: Petzl ACCU Core Rechargeable Battery
